title: Human Resource
job_overview:
We're seeking for a Human resources professional to join our dynamic team, providing comprehensive support in recruitment, employee relations, investor relation is a plus, administration and compliance.

The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, a strong work ethic and knowledge of employment laws and regulation.

Qualifications:
• No prior experience required (with experience is a Plus)
• Attention to Details
• Excellent verbal communication skills.
• Excellent written communication skills.
